data.title: Free Sessions
data.description: Mental health is important, especially during this pandemic. Learn important coping strategies from therapists & psychiatrists.

data.title: Anonymous & Private
data.description: You have the option to join the support groups anonymously. Turn off your camera and use a nickname.

data.title: Group Support
data.description: You're not alone in this journey, join others who share the same concerns and questions as you.
